ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( Land_Registry_Verified__c = True, ISPICKVAL( Land_Registry__c , 'Individual'), OR(ISPICKVAL(Land_Registry_Primary_Owner_Salutation__c, '') , ISBLANK( Land_Registry_Primary_Owner_First_Name__c ), ISBLANK( Land_Registry_Primary_Owner_Last_Name__c )))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please fill in Land Registry Primary Owner - Salutation , First Name, Last Name
